title: 2 Simple Ways to See New or Upcoming Events on Facebook

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . You'll see this in the upper-right corner (Android) or bottom-right corner (iOS). [1] X Research source If you aren't logged into your Facebook account , enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap See more.
steps.content: Tap See more . This is at the bottom of the listed apps. More options will expand.

steps.title: Tap Events.
steps.content: Tap Events . You can find this towards the middle of the page. Some users reported this option missing from the mobile app. If you don't see Events , you can use your mobile browser instead: Go to https://www.facebook.com/ using your mobile browser. Enter your login information and tap Log in . Tap ☰ in the top-right corner. Tap Events .

steps.title: Find an event.
steps.content: Find an event. By default, you'll see the Top events listed below. Tap a category at the top to filter your search, such as: Top , Local , This week , Friends , Groups , or Following . To add a location, tap Near me and enter a location . To add a date, tap Any date and enter a date. To search for specific events using keywords, tap the magnifying glass icon.

steps.title: Join an event.
steps.content: Join an event. If you find an event you're interested in, you can tap Interested to let others know you may come, or tap Going to confirm. To add an event to your calendar, tap ••• next to the event, and then tap Add to Calendar .

steps.title: Click Events.
steps.content: Click Events . You'll see this in the left panel. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address and password to do so now. You'll immediately see a list of upcoming events that are near you or your friends have responded to. Below that, you'll see a mix of events that the Facebook algorithm thinks you'll be interested in.

steps.title: Find an event.
steps.content: Find an event. Click Your Events to see all the events you've been invited to, hosting, interested in, or past events. Click a category at the top to filter your search, such as: Top , Friends , or Following . To add a location, click My location and enter a location. To add a date, click Any date and select a date. To search for specific events using keywords, click the search field at the top-left corner. You can also create a new event .

steps.title: Join an event.
steps.content: Join an event. If you find an event you're interested in, click Interested to let others know you may come, or click Going to confirm your attendance. To add an event to your calendar, click ••• next to the event, and then click Add to Calendar .
